lines.text: To die among friends. Can a man ask more? Can the world offer less? Who wants to live 'till the last bottle is empty? It's all-for one, d'Artagnan, and one for all.

[while dueling]
Why don't you use your right hand, Athos?
I save my right hand for my drinking.
Oh monsieur! Monsieur, you come from the heavens.
No mademoiselle, just from upstairs.
I come from the end of the earth to implore you.
I thought you said you came from upstairs.
This is no hour for composing letters or looking happy.

[to the queen]
England is mine, France shall be mine, and you shall be mine.
I kissed the Queen's hand!
Have you no higher ambitions?
It takes a good man to prevent a catastrophe, Milady, and a great man to make use of one.
But, your grace, how can you trust me with such a confidence? What if I refuse to go to England?
Can there be anybody more trustworthy, Milady, than an ambitious woman of fashion... with a history?
Porthos, when did a wound ever come between you and a fight?

[lying on his stomach]
Well, unfortunately the position of this one comes between me and my horse.
Whatever my reputation or my D'Artagnan's, I don't take love lightly.

This was my family's chapel, Charlotte. You'll remember we took our vows here. I loved you, Charlotte. I still love you. I love you as I love war and drunkeness. I love you as men love all that is worst for them.
Well, Athos, in a matter of hours we'll be on the road to Spain with a price on our heads. Will we live to see France again?
Will we live to see Spain?

[preparing to duel D'Artagnan with an injured right arm]
You'll find the left hand most confusing.

It takes a good man to prevent a catastrophe, Milady, and a great man to make use of one. You and I, my dear, are rare new creatures in this ancient world of impulsive men. We have intellect. We think. And when we think, our impulsive enemies are helpless.

[to D'Artagnan]
My friend, my friend. My young country friend, when will you learn about Paris? By now Richelieu, without the slightest question, knows even the color of your underpants.
